Posts.Content: loretta wrote: Hi Ladies ... I'm going in for a lumpectomy tomorrow at 7:30am.  A busy doctor (he has 10 surgeries scheduled!), but is very experienced and well thought of by his peers.  Any tips about what to do to prepare the day before surgery?  And keep me in your prayers ...God is good! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Surgery tomorrow -- a little prayer! loretta Jellydonut

Posts.Content: Nov 11, 2007 09:47PM loretta wrote: Blessings to all of you!!  The lumpectomy went smoothly and the surgeon told my husband the preliminary results indicate no cancer has spread to the sentinel lymph node.  I'm home with surprisingly little pain.  Your prayers availed much.  I meet with the doctor on Friday.
Posts.Title: Surgery tomorrow -- a little prayer! loretta Jellydonut
